name: Invalid login attempt to the portal [test_user.com-testing@123-The Email field is not a valid e-mail address.]

steps.name: Given User is on the application home page
When User performs login with "test_user.com" and "testing@123"
Then Login attempt should fail with the message "The Email field is not a valid e-mail address."

attachments.name: screenshot: Invalid login attempt to the portal

parameters.name: notification
parameters.value: The Email field is not a valid e-mail address.

fullName: features\mitigram_tests.feature:Invalid login attempt to the portal
